import React from "react" import {useState} from "react" import Axios from "axios" function Forms(){ const [name,setName] = useState(""); const [age,setAge] = useState(""); const [gender,setGender] = useState(""); const [bloodGroup,setbloodGroup] = useState(""); const [start,setStart] = useState(""); const [startpin,setStartpin] = useState(""); const [arriving,setArriving] = useState(""); const [destpin,setDestpin] = useState(""); const [date,setDate] = useState(""); const [departure,setDeparture] = useState(""); const [seat,setSeat] = useState(""); const [tot,setTot] = useState(""); const [fare,setFare] = useState(""); const [transporttype,setTransporttype] = useState(""); const [vehicleno,setVehicleno] = useState(""); const [ticket,setTicket] = useState(""); const [booking,setBooking] = useState(""); const [verification,setVerification] = useState(""); const Submit = () => { Axios.post("http://localhost:1000/forms",{ name:name, age:age, gender:gender, bloodgroup:bloodGroup, start:start, startpin:startpin, arriving:arriving, destpin:destpin, date:date, departure:departure, seat:seat, tot:tot, fare:fare, transporttype:transporttype, vehicleno:vehicleno, ticket:ticket, booking:booking, verification:verification, }).then(() => { console.log("Success") }) } return(

TRAVEL INFORMATION SYSTEM

{setName.event.value}}/> {setDeparture.event.value}}/>
{setAge.event.value}}/> {setSeat.event.value}}/>
{setGender.event.value}}/> {setTot.event.value}}/>
{setbloodGroup.event.value}}/> {setFare.event.value}}/>
{setStart.event.value}}/> {setTransporttype.event.value}}/>
{setStartpin.event.value}}/> {setVehicleno.event.value}}/>
{setArriving.event.value}}/> {setTicket.event.value}}/>
{setDestpin.event.value}}/> {setBooking.event.value}}/>
{setDate.event.value}}/> {setVerification.event.value}}/>
) } export default Forms
